content:
So when is Hal9000 going to get back into blogging?  I love his material but there is simply not enough of it.  

I know, you could have a father-son face-off on "code is the model" (unless, by some quirk, he agrees with you, and that would be interesting too).
Please give my well wishes to both your parents and your family.  Gods do I miss you all...I wish my exile in the far North would come to an end soon.
